name: chatgpt-translate
description: vscode translate extension use chatgpt api

commands.title: translate select text and write to newline
translate select text and replace original text

chatgpt-translate.chatgpt-api-key.default: Replace With Your ChatGPT API Key
chatgpt-translate.chatgpt-api-key.description: Replace With Your ChatGPT API Key

chatgpt-translate.openai-model.description: Please enter the model your want use. Default: gpt-3.5-turbo. You can get other model from https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/gpt-3

chatgpt-translate.openai-full-url.description: Please enter the custom openai full url. Default: https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions

chatgpt-translate.azure-openai-full-url.description: Please enter your custom azure openai full url. Default: empty. You azure openai url is like https://YOUR_ENDPOINT_NAME.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/YOUR_DEPLOYMENT_NAME/completions?api-version=2022-12-01

chatgpt-translate.azure-key.description: Please enter your azure key. Default: empty. You can get your azure key from https://portal.azure.com/

chatgpt-translate.api-platform.description: Please enter the api platform you want use. Default: openai. You can use openai or azure-openai.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
